title: I'm still having issues with the blank text in chat? (New Client)
body: I thought I saw an alert a few days ago saying Riot was working on a fix for the blank text messages on the new client. Well, I'm still having that problem. Any help?

replies.body: I have exactly the same problem. After every first game. Only a damn game-restart fix it for me... until i have played another game.....doh.

We should have all those blank chat bubbles fixed up by now, but if you're still having problems with it please shoot me a screenshot if you don't mind. That way I'll be able to reach out to who I need to in order to help you get this fixed!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9zq7QEu9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-13T02:35:59.508+0000)

> We should have all those blank chat bubbles fixed up by now, but if you're still having problems with it please shoot me a screenshot if you don't mind. That way I'll be able to reach out to who I need to in order to help you get this fixed!

http://i.imgur.com/7xYj1Vd.png Here's an image. Also, sometimes the game lobby chat will go blank as well. I haven't been able to recreate it though.
Oh snap yea that's no good. Let's go ahead and have you shoot our tech guys a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can take another look into this issue!
Every time I get out of my first game after logging in, my chat bubbles all go blank. Kinda surprised this is an issue at all.
